alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 22 at 3:22PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. .Ongoing snow melt will contribute to elevated river flows. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and will continue. Small adjustments made to reservoir releases will lead to slightly reduced river flows. * WHERE...East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Flood Stage, minor flooding in reach. East Walker Road closed and other low rural roads likely closed at lowest points. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM PDT Thursday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 PM PDT Thursday was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet tomorrow afternoon. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: East Walker Road remains closed, use caution near river banks, prolonged high flows may lead to bank instability. There may also be debris within the river channel. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon.
